com.here.android.mpa.routing

Class RouteWaypointSorter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.android.mpa.routing.RouteWaypointSorter

  • public final class RouteWaypointSorter
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the definition of the RouteWaypointSorter class. This is an utility that sorts given waypoints by the distance between each geocoordinates in the order that will minimize distance traveled. IMPORTANT: This is a Beta API, and is subject to change without notice.
    Audience:
    internal

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  RouteWaypointSorter.EndpointsType
      Endpoints type for the first and last waypoints in the list.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RouteWaypointSorter(java.util.List<RouteWaypoint> waypoints)
      Initializes a RouteWaypointSorter instance with specified list of RouteWaypoint with the default START_ANYWHERE_END_ANYWHERE EndpointsType.
      RouteWaypointSorter(java.util.List<RouteWaypoint> waypoints, RouteWaypointSorter.EndpointsType endpointsType)
      Initializes a RouteWaypointSorter instance with specified list of RouteWaypoint with the specified EndpointsType.

      • RouteWaypointSorter

        public RouteWaypointSorter(java.util.List<RouteWaypoint> waypoints)
        Initializes a RouteWaypointSorter instance with specified list of RouteWaypoint with the default START_ANYWHERE_END_ANYWHERE EndpointsType.
        Parameters:
        waypoints - A list of RouteWaypoint, must not be null, each RouteWaypoint must not be null either.

      • RouteWaypointSorter

        public RouteWaypointSorter(java.util.List<RouteWaypoint> waypoints,
                           RouteWaypointSorter.EndpointsType endpointsType)
        Initializes a RouteWaypointSorter instance with specified list of RouteWaypoint with the specified EndpointsType.
        Parameters:
        waypoints - A list of RouteWaypoint, must not be null, each RouteWaypoint must not be null either.
        endpointsType - Specifies the endpoints type, see EndpointsType

    • Method Detail

      • getEndpointsType

        public RouteWaypointSorter.EndpointsType getEndpointsType()
        Gets the endpoints type, see RouteWaypointSorter.EndpointsType for valid values. This is @link EndpointsType#START_ANYWHERE_END_ANYWHERE} type by default.
        Returns:
        The current EndpointsType.

      • getWaypoints

        public java.util.List<RouteWaypoint> getWaypoints()
        The list of RouteWaypoint to be sorted
        Returns:
        List of waypoints.

      • getShortestPathOrdinals

        public int[] getShortestPathOrdinals()
        An array of indexes. This is the shortest path represented by the indexes that correspond to the given waypoints. e.g. {0, 2, 1, 3} means the shortest path is: the 1st waypoint, 3rd waypoint, 2nd waypoint, then the 4th waypoint from the given waypoints array.
        Returns:
        The array of indexes of RouteWaypoint in the given waypoints list.
